Title: Rust and Bone
Writer: Jacques Audiard (screenplay), Thomas Bidegain (screenplay), Craig Davidson (story)
Actors: Marion Cotillard, Matthias Schoenaerts, Armand Verdure, CÃ©line Sallette
Plot: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 30 wins & 56 nominations.
